NoticeData.Contents: World 9: Second-Half Update - Stages 431–450 added - The final stages of the regular World 9 have been released. - 10 Mythic-grade gear pieces added: 5 Earth-attribute and 5 Wind-attribute. - 20 stage quests (for 431–450) and 10 equipment-crafting quests added. - World 9 Dialog Added - The final chapter of the main scenario unfolds across Stages 401–450. Change to Mobile Login Methods - On first login in the mobile version, you will no longer be able to sign in via Twitter or Discord. - This will be applied to the Apple M build first. Apple K and Android M/K will adopt the change starting with the next update. Improvements - Adventure Boss bounty distribution updated - Before: 15% to slayers, 80% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - Now: 30% to slayers, 65% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - A Planetarium account will distribute at least 200,000 NCG per chain as bounty—your interest and participation are appreciated. - Item-related storage improvements - Improved the blockchain storage model for items, skills, and stats. - Adjusted the required CP for sweeps on stages 401–430. - The CP needed to perform sweeps on stages 401–430 has been reduced. - Mythic-grade costume “Skuld” added - Skuld is now included in Summon and Synthesis targets. - 27 new Collections - 2 Skuld-related collections. - 10 “no-skill” collections for World 9 Normal, Fire, and Water attribute gear. - 15 Dust/Item collections: 5 Ruby Dust, 5 Emerald Dust, 5 Golden Meat. - Stage dialog display order changed - Before: shown after the stage result popup. - Now: shown before the stage result popup. - Costume Summon probability info popup order changed - Now sorted in descending order from higher grade to lower grade. - Settings - Removed the Redeem Code button.

World 9: Second-Half Update - Stages 431–450 added - The final stages of the regular World 9 have been released. - 10 Mythic-grade gear pieces added: 5 Earth-attribute and 5 Wind-attribute. - 20 stage quests (for 431–450) and 10 equipment-crafting quests added. - World 9 Dialog Added - The final chapter of the main scenario unfolds across Stages 401–450. Change to Mobile Login Methods - On first login in the mobile version, you will no longer be able to sign in via Twitter or Discord. - This will be applied to the Apple M build first. Apple K and Android M/K will adopt the change starting with the next update. Improvements - Adventure Boss bounty distribution updated - Before: 15% to slayers, 80% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - Now: 30% to slayers, 65% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - A Planetarium account will distribute at least 200,000 NCG per chain as bounty—your interest and participation are appreciated. - Item-related storage improvements - Improved the blockchain storage model for items, skills, and stats. - Adjusted the required CP for sweeps on stages 401–430. - The CP needed to perform sweeps on stages 401–430 has been reduced. - Mythic-grade costume “Skuld” added - Skuld is now included in Summon and Synthesis targets. - 27 new Collections - 2 Skuld-related collections. - 10 “no-skill” collections for World 9 Normal, Fire, and Water attribute gear. - 15 Dust/Item collections: 5 Ruby Dust, 5 Emerald Dust, 5 Golden Meat. - Stage dialog display order changed - Before: shown after the stage result popup. - Now: shown before the stage result popup. - Costume Summon probability info popup order changed - Now sorted in descending order from higher grade to lower grade. - Settings - Removed the Redeem Code button.

Event Dungeon - Dust Vault - A 20-floor event dungeon will run for four weeks. - Every five floors, you can earn a variety of hammers and goden & ruby & emerald dusts. Game Improvement - CP values will now show comma separators every three digits, making equipment and player information easier to read. - The Free-Package contents have been enhanced. - Depending on your level, you can now receive even more Dust, AP Potions, and Hourglasses for free. - Mileage rewards have been added. - A Mythic-grade costume, Urdr, is now available. - This costume cannot be obtained through synthesis.

Synthesis Balance Adjustment - We have tweaked the required material amounts and success rates in the Synthesis system so that you can now reliably obtain higher-grade items. Mythic-grade items are also obtainable via synthesis - New Grimoires Added - 9 Mythical-grade grimoires - You can obtain them through the Summoning and Synthesis systems - New Costumes Added - 1 Mythical-grade costume - You can obtain them through the Summoning and Synthesis systems. - Worldboss Balance Adjustment - The World Boss has been strengthened to match the players’ boosted stats following the release of new equipment. - A maximum cap has now been applied to stat reduction skills - ATK Reduction(Aegis Aura) - Max 85% - SPD Decrease (Fenrir SPD Down Rune) - Max 20% - The skill cap is applied to each individual skill ID up to its maximum value, and then the results are added together.

World 9 Update – Part 1 - Stages 401–430 of World 9: Vanaheim have been added. - You can obtain crafting recipes for Normal Mythical-grade equipment from stages 401–405. - Recipes for Fire and Water Mythical-grade equipment can be obtained from stages 415–427. - The crafting system for Mythical-grade equipment now includes the following characteristics: - Golden Dust is required as a material for crafting. - Some materials cannot be substituted with crystals and must be obtained directly through stages. - The Normal Mythical equipment has a lower level requirement of 350, to help existing players transition into World 9 more smoothly. - The remaining stages of World 9 and the final set of equipment will be released in the next update. - Stage dialogues that reveal the story of World 9 will also be available in the next update. 4 New Mythical-grade Auras Added - The following four Mythical-grade auras have been added to aura summons: YMIR, BEAST, AEGIS, and BARRAGE. - Summon rates have been adjusted with the addition of these Mythical-grade auras. 1 New Mythical-grade Costume & 2 New Sacred-grade Costumes - The Mythical-grade "Sea Ran" costume and 2 Sacred-grade costumes have been added to costume summons. - Summon rates have been adjusted with the addition of the Mythical-grade costume. - Sacred-grade costumes have received stat buffs following the introduction of the new Mythical grade. Rune Enhancement Cost Adjustment - To reduce the burden of enhancing certain runes, frequent NCG requirements have been compressed into 50-level intervals, and the required number of rune shards has been increased. - The following runes are included in this adjustment: - Golden Leaf Rune, Fenrir HP Rune, Fenrir ATK Rune, Fenrir Bleeding Rune, Saehrimnir HIT Rune, Saehrimnir DEF Rune, Saehrimnir Skill Rune, Stun Rune (Adventure), Stun Rune (Arena), Vampiric Rune (Adventure), Vampiric Rune (World Boss), Stamina Rune (Adventure), Stamina Rune (Arena), Quick Rune (Arena), Quick Rune (World Boss) Skill Balance Changes - The max damage of the Thorns skill attached to some Legend armor and world boss runes has been adjusted. - The damage dealt by these items and runes is now capped at 200,000 per hit. Leaderboard Feature Resumed - The leaderboard feature has been resumed for two categories in the client: Ability and World.
